property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Nun with a Gun

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you win a COMBAT struggle at a story to which Sister Sofia is committed, choose and wound X of your opponent's characters at that story. X is the number of drained domains your opponent has.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a character you control to put into play from your hand an [The Agency] character with printed cost 3 or lower. Return that character to your hand at the end of the phase.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Syndicate

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Distraught Shopkeeper enters play, exhaust all characters with printed skill 1 or lower.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Syndicate

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Ready an exhausted character you control. Then each opponent draws a card.

property.value: Attach to a [Miskatonic University] character you control. Action: Exhaust Pnakotic Manuscripts to choose a character you control. Attached character gains all of that characters printed icons until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Shuffle Faceless Abductor into your deck to choose a non-ANCIENT ONE character with skill 3 or lower. Return that character to it's owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While Sweet Old Lady is committed to a story alone, opponents must pay 2 to commit characters to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Old Man of the Woods insane to choose and destroy an insane character.

property.value: Rattletrap Bus Driver

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose a non-ANCIENT ONE character. Destroy all copies of that character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Treat all neutral characters in play as if their printed text boxes were blank.
